dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Hsss! What do you want, puny creature?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, do not attack me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Ha! I only know the language of power!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your strength. Let's not engage in battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect won't save you. You will fall like the rest.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see there's no reasoning with you. I will leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leaving? You dare turn your back on me? Prepare for my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will challenge your power. Let's see who is stronger.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or foolishness? I admire your courage, but it will be your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. Prepare for a fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolishness is your path? So be it. I shall crush you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not yield. I am ready for battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness will lead you to your demise. Brace yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I reconsider. Let's find a peaceful solution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Changing your mind? It matters not. Your fate is sealed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will use my cunning to outsmart you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cunning? Ha! I'll enjoy watching you fail.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will prove you wrong. Prepare for my strategy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strategy alone will not save you. Your intelligence is no match for my strength.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see no point in continuing this. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leaving so soon? You've amused me. Begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you! Face me in combat!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a weakling. Prepare to be crushed!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no beast. Let's settle this now!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fearlessness or ignorance? It matters little. You will be vanquished.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand my ground. Let's fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Standing firm? Your end approaches swiftly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see now this is futile. I will retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retreating? Weakness unveiled. I shall not let you escape.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your power. Let us not fight, but join forces.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces? Laughable. I have no need for alliances.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we can rule this land. Consider my offer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Rule together? I bow to none. Your presence is no longer tolerated.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, let us part ways peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Parting ways? Farewell, insignificant one.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not fight you, but prove my worth in a different way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Proving worth without battle? Preposterous!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Watch closely. I will impress you with my talent.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impress me? The audacity! Prepare for disappointment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you're not interested. I will take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interest lost. Begone, insignificant one.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge. Share your wisdom with me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Wisdom? Such concepts are wasted on the feeble-minded.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I may not be as powerful as you, but I seek to learn.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Seeking knowledge from the likes of you? Amusing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Teach me your ways, mighty one. I am willing to learn.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Willing to learn? Your humility is your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you have no interest. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leaving in peace? Your relevance fades swiftly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your power is evident. Let us not squander it in battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Spare me your attempts at flattery. You bore me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Flattery is not my intention. I seek common ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Common ground? None exists between us. Prepare for my fury.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see communication is futile. I shall take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Futility acknowledged. Vanish from my sight, insignificant creature.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us exchange knowledge. I have insights to offer in return.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Insights? From you? I highly doubt it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Doubt all you want. I have valuable knowledge to share.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Valuable? To whom? Certainly not to me. Prepare for annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your loss if you refuse. Farewell, mighty one.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Refusal accepted. Begone, insignificant nuisance.
